messageBody:
I'm relatively new but this seam like something that can be done and
that someone should have done it by now, or am I way off on this
thought.

I have been give around 160 separate unit test files, instead of
listing them one line at a time.
Is there a way I can grab them from the package directory and do a
mass add of the test cases at run time?

I was hoping I can loop through all the classes in a package, since
all the testcases are in the same package.
(package com.thc.ids.application.hcs.test.CalculatorTest.tests;)

I was hoping to be able to some kind of mass add of the 160 test
case files. Below is a sample of 4 of the 160.



public class TestLabSuite
{

{
junit.textui.TestRunner.run( suite() );
}

{

// Labs
